API_Description: Sends a verification email to the user using the provided username and password.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'swSendVerifyEmail' suggests that it is responsible for sending a verification email, likely as part of a user authentication or registration process.
Returns: A boolean indicating whether the verification email was successfully sent.
Returns_Reason: Methods that perform an action like sending an email typically return a boolean to indicate success or failure.

cUsername.description: The username of the account to which the verification email will be sent.
cUsername.description_reason: The parameter name 'cUsername' implies it is used to specify the account or user for which the email verification is intended.
cUsername.type_reason: Usernames are typically represented as strings in most systems.

cPassword.description: The password associated with the username, used for authentication purposes.
cPassword.description_reason: The parameter name 'cPassword' suggests it is used to authenticate the user before sending the verification email.
cPassword.type_reason: Passwords are generally represented as strings to allow for a combination of characters.
